summary: I made it so dog followers are essential, their run speed has been increased by %50 so they can keep with you. I also added a knockdown chance to Meeko (%25) & Valiance (%50)
descriptionHtml:
Ok folks here\'s a run down of what i\'ve done and why.
I felt as though the dogs were unappreciated and I saw no mods for them, I couldn\'t help but care for meeko when I realized his owner was dead.
The dogs are ranked from lowest to strongest stray, meeko, & vigilence.

Stray has been made essential and has his speed increased by %50 and i didn\'t do anything else to this one.

Meeko has been made essential had his speed increased by %50 and has had a %25 chance to knock-down to his forward lunge attack and increased his aggression to aggressive.

Vigilence has had the most improvement since he\'s a trained dog and cost 500 gold, he\'s been made essential has his speed increased by %50 and has had a %50 chance to knock-down in his forward lunge attack and has the highest aggression to very aggressive.

If anyone has suggestions feel free to post and perhaps we can name the stray dog.
author: birchdorch
